title: Baker Mayfield, NCAAFB, LeBron James, and NFL chances
itunes:title: Baker Mayfield, NCAAFB, LeBron James, and NFL chances
description:
Colin breaks down another reason Baker Mayfield doesn't get it, the problem with the Browns, why he agrees with the College Football Rankings, his thoughts on LeBron James playing PG, and his new NFL teams he feels have a chance to win it all. Guests include Nick Wright, Bruce Gradkowski, Marcedes Lewis, and Joel Klatt.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
